Articles.Content:
Including non-kerbonauts

I voted everyone cause they are all cool. Jeb and Linus by a little. I have a little Linus and a little Jeb in me. Majority of Linus though (thankfully)
I'd vote everyone too, but for me I'd relate most to Bobak Kerman from the trailers, since he shows the most panic when a mun lander goes down and explodes
Elon Kerman (No like seriously, it did generate that name on my lt a starship and sent him on it.)
Best one I ever got was Mama Kermin.  Alas she was so short lived in 2015 she only made it into one screenshot before dying.
